name: XWUI Popconfirm Component
description: Popover component with confirmation action. Extends XWUIPopover with confirm/cancel buttons. Useful for confirming destructive actions or important operations. Uses XWUIPopover internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

title.description: Title text for the confirmation popover

okButtonProps.description: Additional props for the OK button

cancelButtonProps.description: Additional props for the Cancel button

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the popconfirm

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

onConfirm.description: Callback function when user confirms (not serializable in JSON)

onCancel.description: Callback function when user cancels (not serializable in JSON)

triggerElement.description: Trigger element or selector string to attach popconfirm to
